title: Computer-Assisted Learning (CAL) Integration Strategies for Organizational Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric access environments, with emerging needs for integrating organizational innovation and learning

learning_goals: Learners can establish a three-stage (introduction-application-evaluation) implementation plan for using CAL as an organizational innovation tool.
Learners can design a method to improve science job competencies by at least 20% using smartphone-based CAL tools.
Learners can analyze organizational/cultural barriers arising during CAL integration and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
